description: Once you try these gourmet sausage subs loaded with kale slaw and chilli pineapple salsa, you'll never go back to a regular sub.
name: Loaded Sausage Subs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Arrange chips on a tray lined with baking paper. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and tender.
Meanwhile, preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook sausages, turning, for 6 minutes or until cooked through.
Prepare kaleslaw kit according to packet instructions. Place pineapple, chilli and onion in a medium bowl. Season with pepper and toss to combine.
Fill rolls with slaw, sausages and pineapple salsa. Serve with chips.
